item.title: Keep playing yum, rpmbuild, and chroot
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It’s pretty fun, now I can create a job in jenkins, then launch two build script, one for CentOS5 and the other for CentOS6, both of them will build x86_64 and i386 packages. setarch is my friend to save my effort on creating 32-bit images over 64-bit system ðŸ˜› , however, I still need to [...]
item.content:encoded:
It’s pretty fun, now I can create a job in jenkins, then launch two build script, one for CentOS5 and the other for CentOS6, both of them will build x86_64 and i386 packages.

setarch is my friend to save my effort on creating 32-bit images over 64-bit system , however, I still need to verify if the 32-bit packages is actually working for 32-bit platform.
